author: trawick
msg: forward-port part of r781073 from the 1.3.x branch
in my testing, poll() use is okay in 1.4.x and trunk because the wakeup pipe support
added in 1.4.x has a side-effect of working around OS X poll() bogosity

author: jchris
msg: refactor and cleanup of couch_httpd_show. all tests passing again.

author: slaws
msg: Use a CountDownLatch instead of a manual count of concurrent threads. Need 1.x change for TUSCANY-3076 for this to work.

author: slaws
msg: rename launcher for consistency with jumpstart launcher and simplify code to reduce line count.
